boolean flood_recv (  comBuf *  pkt,
uint8_t **  footer,
uint8_t  port
) 
 

Receive a packet that came using the flooding protocol.

NOTE: Must subtract the sizeof route header from pkt->size so the net layer can determine whether any more data is available.

Parameters:
pkt Packet received
footer Location
Returns:
FALSE if failure, else return TRUE
